RegistrationScreen.__about_game: It is a simple, fun and highly customizable kanban simulation game. Since its creation in 2014 it has been used by trainers and coaches in Lean, Agile and Kanban-related events the world over.
RegistrationScreen.__communication_between_players_desc: To try it, just participate as a player or spectator and share the link. Youâ€™ll need to be in close online communication while you play (we donâ€™t provide that part).
RegistrationScreen.__several_games_update_desc: You no longer need to run featureban from different browsers: now you can participate in several games in one browser.

FinishScreen.__iteration_card_states_title: Cards position by the end of iteration

MobileNotSupportedScreen.__mobile_is_not_supported: Unfortunately, playing Featureban on a small screen is extremely inconvenient 😞
MobileNotSupportedScreen.__supported_devices: Please open the game from a computer or tablet.

CustomThemeDialog.__select_the_column_for_card_names: Select the column for card names
CustomThemeDialog.__upload_instruction: You can upload your own card theme for the game. To do this, please prepare a file like this:

Errors.__empty_file: The file is empty! Please, try another one.

GameSettings.__strict_mode_desc: Game's interface won't allow to drag and drop cards not related to you
GameSettings.__normal_mode_desc: Game's interface will allow wrong pushes, but will notify you about it and revert card's state

Errors.__not_enough_players: Should be at least 3 players! Please, invite more players

LobbyScreen.__facilitator_header_desc: Ability to start/stop iterations (usually needs only for a facilitator)
LobbyScreen.__share_link_description: Dear {{username}}, please share this link with colleagues, we need at least 3 person to start the game, maximum - 5.
LobbyScreen.__rules_for_each_player: Rules will be displayed for each player, you don't need to tell them.

Sponsorship.__description_1: We are pleased to develop Featureban online and do not plan to charge a fee for using the game.
Sponsorship.__description_2: If you want to support the project and give us faith that we are doing the right thing - please donate any amount.

KaitenPromo.__title: Looking for an online kanban software?
KaitenPromo.__description_1: Kaiten is online visualization software for companies and teams who are using Kanban method or agile approaches (Scrum, LeSS, etc.)

UserRemovalDialog.__confirm_text: Are you sure you want to change Â«{{userName}}Â» role to spectator? Please note, spectators don't participate in game, they just watch it.
UserRemovalDialog.__choose_user_for_transfer: Please choose person, who will get assigned to all in progress Â«{{userName}}Â» cards

PlayerTooltip.__has_black: Has black card and should complete following actions
PlayerTooltip.__has_red: Has red card and should choose one of the following actions

black.__first_rule: to one of player's currently unblocked items
black.__second_rule: move a card from the Â«QueueÂ» one column to the right into the Â«DoingÂ» column so it becomes Work In Progress. And only if player can't start new item - should help someone!

red.__first_rule: one of player's unblocked cards one column right
red.__third_rule: move a card from the Â«QueueÂ» one column to the right into the Â«DoingÂ» column so it becomes Work In Progress
red.__last_rule: And only if player can't move own cards - should help someone!

AppBar.__confirm_end_game: Confirm the end of the game

IterationDialog.__confirm_admin_iteration_start_text: Please note, not every player is ready. Do you want to start iteration without waiting for readiness of each player?
IterationDialog.__facilitator_info: If you want to clean up board before the second iteration â€“ please do it.
IterationDialog.__players_info: Game organizers prepare the game board for the start of the second iteration.
IterationDialog.__sidebar_info_title: Preparing game board for new iteration
IterationDialog.__sidebar_info_description: Remove any not finished cards or add new cards.
IterationDialog.__preIterationQuestionsTitle: Please answer a few questions. All of them are optional.
secondPreIterationQuestions: What elements seem familiar from your working experience? New?
Suppose we continue in this way indefinitely. Then what happens?
thirdPreIterationQuestions: How was it different? Please name drawbacks and benefits.
Could you guess any variations on this theme? Are there any other ways to limit work in progress?
Name parallels from your working experience.
IterationDialog.__third_iteration_reset_game_state_info: Please note, all cards from current iteration will be removed. Third iteration will start with new cards in column Â«QueueÂ».

CoinSection.__coin_title_current_player_red: Today you have a red card

red.__rules_choice: Choose one of the following actions:
red.__first_rule: one of your unblocked cards one column right
red.__third_rule: move a card from the Â«QueueÂ» one column to the right into the Â«DoingÂ» column so it becomes Work In Progress
red.__last_rule: And only if you can't move own cards - Help someone! Advance or unblock another playerâ€™s card

black.__first_rule: to one of your currently unblocked items
black.__second_rule: move a card from the Â«QueueÂ» one column to the right into the Â«DoingÂ» column so it becomes Work In Progress. And only if you can't start new item - help someone! Advance or unblock another player's card.
black.__last_rule: Help someone! Advance or unblock another playerâ€™s item
